function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmissivity of COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of spread of the virus and impact on worker health","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety measures, including social distancing and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and air quality monitoring systems","People":"Workers in the construction industry","Owner":"Construction companies and government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact on mental health of workers","Impact":"Increased risk of anxiety, depression, and suicide among workers","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, clear communication of new working procedures, and addressing job insecurity","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for mental health support, employee wellness apps, and communication tools for remote work","People":"Workers in the construction industry","Owner":"Construction companies and government agencies"},{"Description":"Late public health response by the UK Government","Impact":"Delayed implementation of measures to flatten the curve and protect businesses","Mitigation":"Review and improve response planning, early implementation of health and safety measures, and proactive communication with the public","Technologies":"Data analytics for early detection, communication platforms for public health messaging, and resource allocation tools","People":"General public and businesses","Owner":"UK government and public health authorities"}]}
